Dataset.Data: select case CNT-PermCNT when 0 then 1 when CNT then -1 else 0 end as Status, ModuleGroup from ( select C.ModuleGroup, count(A.SubActionID) as CNT, nvl(count(B.SubActionID),0) as PermCNT from Sys_Module C inner join (select T.ModuleID, T.ActionID, nvl(T.SubActionID, 0) as SubActionID from sys_group_module T left join Sys_Module_Action T1 on T.ModuleID = T1.ModuleID and T.ActionID = T1.ActionID left join Sys_Module_SubAction T2 on T1.ModuleID = T2.ModuleID and T1.ActionID = T2.ActionID where T1.IsDiv='0' and T1.Checked = '1' and T.Groupid = #AGroupID# ) A on C.ModuleID = A.ModuleID left join Sys_Group_Module B on B.GroupID = #GroupID# and A.ModuleID = B.ModuleID and A.ActionID = B.ActionID and A.SubActionID = B.SubActionID group by C.ModuleGroup ) TT order by TT.ModuleGroup

select case CNT-PermCNT when 0 then 1 when CNT then -1 else 0 end as Status, ModuleID, ModuleCode,ModuleName from ( select A.ModuleID,A.ModuleCode,A.ModuleName,B.CNT,nvl(C.CNT,0) as PermCNT from Sys_Module A inner join ( select T1.ModuleID, count(nvl(T2.SubActionID,0)) as CNT from sys_group_module T left join Sys_Module_Action T1 on T.ModuleID = T1.ModuleID and T.ActionID = T1.ActionID left join Sys_Module_SubAction T2 on T1.ModuleID = T2.ModuleID and T1.ActionID = T2.ActionID where T1.IsDiv='0' and T1.Checked = '1' and T.Groupid = #AGroupID# group by T1.ModuleID ) B on A.ModuleID = B.ModuleID left join ( select A.ModuleID, count(1) as CNT from ( select T1.ModuleID, T1.ActionID, nvl(T2.SubActionID,0) as SubActionID from sys_group_module T left join Sys_Module_Action T1 on T.ModuleID = T1.ModuleID and T.ActionID = T1.ActionID left join Sys_Module_SubAction T2 on T1.ModuleID = T2.ModuleID and T1.ActionID = T2.ActionID where T1.IsDiv='0' and T1.Checked = '1' and T.Groupid = #AGroupID# ) A, Sys_Group_Module B where B.GroupID = #GroupID# and B.ModuleID = A.ModuleID and B.ActionID = A.ActionID and A.SubActionID = B.SubActionID group by A.ModuleID ) C on A.ModuleID = C.ModuleID where A.ModuleGroup=#ModuleGroup# ) TT order by ModuleName

select case CNT-PermCNT when 0 then 1 when CNT then -1 else 0 end as Status, ModuleID, ActionID, ActionCode, ActionName, SubAction from ( select A.ModuleID, A.ActionID, A.ActionCode,A.ActionName,B.CNT,nvl(C.CNT,0) as PermCNT, A.SNO, A.SubAction from Sys_Module_Action A inner join ( select T1.ActionID, count(nvl(T2.SubActionID,0)) as CNT from sys_group_module T left join Sys_Module_Action T1 on T.ModuleID = T1.ModuleID and T.ActionID = T1.ActionID left join Sys_Module_SubAction T2 on T1.ModuleID = T2.ModuleID and T1.ActionID = T2.ActionID where T1.IsDiv='0' and T1.Checked = '1' and T1.ModuleID = #ModuleID# and T.Groupid = #AGroupID# group by T1.ActionID ) B on A.ActionID = B.ActionID left join ( select A.ActionID, count(1) as CNT from ( select T1.ActionID, nvl(T2.SubActionID,0) as SubActionID from sys_group_module T left join Sys_Module_Action T1 on T.ModuleID = T1.ModuleID and T.ActionID = T1.ActionID left join Sys_Module_SubAction T2 on T1.ModuleID = T2.ModuleID and T1.ActionID = T2.ActionID where T1.IsDiv='0' and T1.Checked = '1' and T1.ModuleID = #ModuleID# and T.Groupid = #AGroupID# ) A, Sys_Group_Module B where B.GroupID = #GroupID# and B.ModuleID = #ModuleID# and B.ActionID = A.ActionID and A.SubActionID = B.SubActionID group by A.ActionID ) C on A.ActionID = C.ActionID where A.ModuleID = #ModuleID# ) TT order by SNO

select A.ModuleID, A.ActionID, A.SubActionID, A.SubActionCode, A.SubActionName, case nvl(B.SubActionID,0) when 0 then '-1' else '1' end as Status from Sys_Module_SubAction A left join Sys_Group_Module B on A.ModuleID = B.ModuleID and A.ActionID = B.ActionID and B.GroupID = #GroupID# and A.SubActionID = B.SubActionID where A.ModuleID = #ModuleID# and A.ActionID = #ActionID# order by A.SNO

select '(' || GroupCode || ') ' || GroupName as GroupInfo from Sys_Group where GroupID=#GroupID#

select count(1) cnt from sys_group_user where userid = %{#session.CheckIn.UserID} and groupid = #groupId#
select groupcode from sys_group where mcid = %{#session.CheckIn.MCID} and groupid = #GroupID#
select groupid from sys_group_user where userid = %{#session.CheckIn.UserID}
delete from Sys_Group_Module where GroupID = #GroupID# and ModuleID in (select ModuleID from Sys_Module where ModuleGroup = #ModuleGroup#)

insert into Sys_Group_Module(GroupID, ModuleID, ActionID, SubActionID, UpdateDate, UpdateBy) select #GroupID#, A.ModuleID, B.ActionID, nvl(C.SubActionID, 0), sysdate, %{#session.CheckIn.UserName} from Sys_Module A inner join Sys_Module_Action B on A.ModuleID = B.ModuleID left join Sys_Module_SubAction C on B.ModuleID = C.ModuleID and B.ActionID = C.ActionID where A.ModuleGroup = #ModuleGroup# order by A.ModuleID, B.SNO, C.SNO
delete from Sys_Group_Module where GroupID = #GroupID# and ModuleID = #ModuleID#

insert into Sys_Group_Module(GroupID, ModuleID, ActionID, SubActionID, UpdateDate, UpdateBy) select #GroupID#, A.ModuleID, A.ActionID, nvl(C.SubActionID, 0), sysdate, %{#session.CheckIn.UserName} from Sys_Module_Action A left join Sys_Module_SubAction C on A.ModuleID = C.ModuleID and A.ActionID = C.ActionID where A.ModuleID = #ModuleID# order by A.ModuleID, A.SNO, C.SNO
delete from Sys_Group_Module where GroupID = #GroupID# and ModuleID = #ModuleID# and ActionID = #ActionID#

insert into Sys_Group_Module(GroupID, ModuleID, ActionID, SubActionID, UpdateDate, UpdateBy) select #GroupID#, A.ModuleID, A.ActionID, nvl(C.SubActionID, 0), sysdate, %{#session.CheckIn.UserName} from Sys_Module_Action A left join Sys_Module_SubAction C on A.ModuleID = C.ModuleID and A.ActionID = C.ActionID where A.ModuleID = #ModuleID# and A.ActionID = #ActionID#
delete from Sys_Group_Module where GroupID = #GroupID# and ModuleID = #ModuleID# and ActionID = #ActionID# and SubActionID = #SubActionID#

insert into Sys_Group_Module(GroupID, ModuleID, ActionID, SubActionID, UpdateDate, UpdateBy) select #GroupID#, A.ModuleID, A.ActionID, nvl(A.SubActionID, 0), sysdate, %{#session.CheckIn.UserName} from Sys_Module_SubAction A where A.ModuleID = #ModuleID# and A.ActionID = #ActionID# and A.SubActionID = #SubActionID#

insert into Sys_Group_Module(GroupID, ModuleID, ActionID, SubActionID, UpdateDate, UpdateBy) select #GroupID#, A.ModuleID, A.ActionID, 0, sysdate, %{#session.CheckIn.UserName} from Sys_Module_Action A left join (select ModuleID, ActionID from Sys_Group_Module where GroupID = #GroupID# group by ModuleID, ActionID) B on A.ModuleID = B.ModuleID and A.ActionID = B.ActionID where A.IsDiv = '1' and B.ModuleID is null order by A.ModuleID, A.SNO
